creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: tureen and cover rectangular with clipped corners; red boar's head handles cover sides with scroll bordered mercer coat-of-arms and mottoes 'The Grit Poul' and 'Crux Christi Nostra Corona' flanked by two birds on scroll supports; cover has gilt chain border and pomegranate finial
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
title: Soup tureen and cover
